channel.title: Projects on Fraser McCann
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Fraser McCann

item.title: ADORATE
item.description:
DARE Academy 2025 Runner Up Award Winner


Role: Generalist Programmer/Audio Programmer


Casual RTS Townbuilder! Build up your cult and fight off holy forces!



Wishlist now on Steam!

item.title: Reality Shift
item.description:
Honours Project Artifact


Mixed Reality card game app allowing gameplay online on your real tabletop!


Using the Meta Quest 3, projects onto the real environment while representing players with estimated full body avatars.

item.title: RAT WARS
item.description:
Horde shooter with dynamic music from HEALTH

Gain score to progress the music, shoot on beat hear the drums, and dont miss shots to enable vocals!


Created for the Audio Programming module at Abertay University

item.title: Half-Baked
item.description:
Role: VR Mechanics Programmer


A wacky VR puzzle game where players assume the role of a gingerbread man with no legs, having to use their floppy, half-baked arms to drag themselves and climb to escape the clutches of the evil baker!


Created for the Professional Project module at Abertay University with mentorship from NearLight

item.title: Vanishing Act
item.description:
PSX Survival horror with a spatial inventory.

Play as a witch performing a ritual to escape a monstrous federal agent!


Created for AGDS Freshers Jam 2024

item.title: Fishyphus
item.description:
Creepy fishing simulator where you collect wacky items forever


Created for for AGDS Spooky Jam 2024

item.title: DirectX 11 Project
item.description:
An island scene created in DirectX 11


Created for the Graphics Programming with Shaders Module at Abertay University.

item.title: Inpatient
item.description:
Psychological horror game over multiple days with the player slowly giving away parts of themselves.


Created for AGDS Spooky Jam 2023

item.title: Rob-Bot
item.description:
Silly heist game where you control a robot dog through security cameras!


Created for AGDS Fresher Jam 2023

item.title: Station Sentinels
item.description:
Top down shooter with procedural levels.

Made with Abertay’s Game Education Framework.

Features tile based level generation and A* Pathfinding for enemies.

item.title: Greatest of All Turtle
item.description:
A platformer where you can use your past self to get a leg up!

Jump on your corpses to succeed!


Created for AGDS Freshers Jam 2022

item.title: Touching the Moai is Forbidden
item.description:
Satirical horror based on 2010s viral hits.

Escape a creepy island while hunted by an evil Moai statue.


Created for AGDS Spooky Jam 2022
